title: CHPT Converter
description: This is a subtitle converter. It takes in a text file in the CHPT format (Generated by some DVD Authoring programs) and generates a XML representation suitable for use inside Matroska files.

title: Limpia emails
description: Extracts all email addresses from a blob of text.

title: Webpage to PDF
description: This is a github action that loads a website and renders it to PDF.

title: LM378 calculator
description: This is a simple calculator for the LM378 adjustable regulator. Written using React.

title: Ya llegaron
description: A silly button that says «Ya llegaron».

title: Todos somos pavel
description: A silly, HTML5 full screen video, Just for the giggles.
